strategy_reasoning: Since there are no code updates, this is the perfect moment to reinforce brand identity. Using the 'Community Garden' metaphor connects our name (Pollinations) to the outcome (500+ apps built). The carousel format encourages swiping (engagement) while the lime green aesthetic keeps the feed cohesive and instantly recognizable as Pollinations.

images.prompt: A cute, minimalist illustration of a single pixelated seed sprouting from the ground. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and mint gradient background. Rounded shapes, soft shadows. Friendly illustration style, Gen-Z aesthetic. Text overlay in bubble letters: 'it starts with an idea üå±'. Clean vector art, approachable and welcoming.
images.description: Slide 1: The beginning of the creative journey.

A wide shot of a lush, colorful digital garden with hundreds of unique, diverse flowers blooming. Some flowers look like pixels, some organic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Rounded shapes, joyful atmosphere. Friendly illustration style, Gen-Z aesthetic. Text overlay: '500+ apps blooming üå∏'. Clean vector art.

alt_text: A three-slide carousel illustration. 1. A small pixel seed sprouting on a lime green background. 2. A cute bee adding magic to the plant. 3. A field of 500+ diverse digital flowers blooming under a soft gradient sky.
